attributes.action: Insist that all Non UK travellers paperwork is scanned at point of departure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To eradicate the problem of immigrants arriving in the UK without papers on commercial flights and sea ferries all documents should be scanned in at point of departure and transmitted to point of entry prior to the plane landing or the ship docking.
This would remove the problem of holding people who arrive without documentation after flushing it down the aircraft toilet or throwing it overboard into the North Sea
